嚘嚘嚘

嚘字的基本解释

嚘
yōu
语未定的样子。
气逆：“婴儿于号，三日不嚘。”
叹气声。

嚘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōu］
［《廣韻》於求切，平尤，影。］
(1)语未定貌。
(2)气逆。

嚘字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嚘； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页212第40
【唐韻】【集韻】?於求切，音憂。【說文】語未定貌。【正字通】漢書東方朔傳，咿嚘啞者，辭未定也。◎按漢書本作伊優亞。　又【廣韻】欭嚘，歎也。亦作咿嚘。【韓愈·赴江陵途中寄三學士詩】佇立久咿嚘。　又【玉篇】老子曰：終日號而嗌不嚘。嚘，氣逆也。〇按今本老子作嗄。　又【集韻】或作㱊。○按《廣韻》嚘訓欭嚘，㱊訓氣逆，音同義別。《集韻》因《玉篇》嚘訓氣逆，故合爲一。

嚘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嚘字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Bang
yōu
The language is undecided.
Qi Ni: "The baby is on the number, and he won't cry for three days."
Sigh.
Bang

[①]［yōu］
["Guangyun" Yu Qiuqi, Pingyou, Ying. ]
(1) The language is unfinished.
(2) Gas reversal.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Moral Department] 　嚘; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 212 to 40
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? In seeking to cut, the sound is worried. [Speaking] The language has not been finalized. [Zhengzitong] Hanshu Dongfang Shuo Zhuan, who is babbled and dumb, his speech is still undecided. ◎According to the Chinese book as Iyouya.　[Guang Yun] Hey, sigh. Also made 咿嚘. 【Han Yu·Send Three Scholar Poems on the Way to Jiangling】Stand for a long time.　[Jade Chapter] Lao Tzu said: The number of the whole day is not 嗌嗌嚘. Boom, the gas goes against it. 〇According to this book, I do.　 [Ji Yun] or Zuo 㱊. ○According to "Guang Yun" 嚘 Xun 欭 嚘, 㱊 Xun Qi inverse, the sound is synonymous. "Jiyun" is united because of the inverse of "Yu Pian"'s exhortation.

гл. захлёбываться, задыхаться; сипеть
